work.title: Software Developer
duties: Newly minted Golang developer for PayHub® services
Perl developer on the PaymentExpress® team
Integrated new state and county clients with PaymentExpress

work.title: Software Developer II
duties: Designed and developed a DevOps portal housing a number of monitoring tools using AngularJS, TypeScript, and SCSS using Gulp.js as a build tool
Built REST APIs using Node.js with Express.js to query server, Apache Kafka, Apache ZooKeeper, TestRail, and other miscellaneous data in real-time
Created automated testing suites using Scala, Cucumber, JUnit, and Mockito to expedite the testing phase of the SDLC
Generated automated tasks for monitoring server health and validation of processed files in the ETL pipeline using Bash, Python, and HBase queries
Developed a multi-threaded application used for data quality analysis with Scala, sbt, and Apache Hive SQL
Developed an account tracking tool for weekly status updates using a complex SQL query that reads Apache HBase and Apache Hive tables
Implemented, maintained, and executed build and deployment plans via the Atlassian software stack as a DevOps engineer
Participated in grooming, planning, and daily standups within a Scrum environment
Wrote comprehensive documentation on completed projects denoting usage and process flow
Reviewed daily Linux server logs to monitor development and production servers for potential problems
Carried out 24/7 on-call duties to assess and remedy production issues

work.title: IT Business Analyst Intern
duties: Oversaw a multi-year project that inventories and rationalizes every application used by TE globally along with their associated operating costs, user base, strategic value, etc.
Collaborated with international teams to improve the data acquisition process and analyze the application portfolio data
Designed a prototype dashboard using the D3.js library and CAML Queries to summarize the application portfolio data
Provided quality assurance testing and wrote technical documentation for a web-based application tracker

unrelated.title: Certified Nursing Assistant

duties: Provided healthcare for geriatric patients in both a long-term and acute rehab facility
Assisted in bathing, skin care, oral care, feeding, physical therapy, etc of patients
Documented healthcare provided and medical details of patients
Aided nurses with more advanced patient care

unrelated.title: Quality Control Technician (temp.)
duties: Analyzed food production lines to maintain compliance with GMP standards
Performed numerous checks on products including mass, oxygen levels, packaging, etc.
Documented daily checks with statistical analysis to ensure factory requirements
Improved functionality of company’s Excel spreadsheets regarding graphical and statistical analysis
